revised_title: Electrostatic Calculation of Molecular Energies and Saturated Molecule Binding Energies
tldr: The authors present a technique for calculating the binding energy of any saturated molecule using the electrostatic theorem. This method applies to molecular-orbital and valence-bond functions and is suitable for complex molecules. The authors demonstrate the method's effectiveness by applying it to the lithium molecule and lithium hydride molecule, yielding results in good agreement with experimental data.
